title: sorting
content: # `prefect.server.schemas.sorting` Schemas for sorting Prefect REST API objects. ## Classes ### `FlowRunSort` Defines flow run sorting options. **Methods:** #### `as_sql_sort` ```python theme={null} as_sql_sort(self, db: 'PrefectDBInterface') -> Iterable[sa.ColumnElement[Any]] ``` Return an expression used to sort flow runs #### `auto` ```python theme={null} auto() -> str ``` Exposes `enum.auto()` to avoid requiring a second import to use `AutoEnum` ### `TaskRunSort` Defines task run sorting options. **Methods:** #### `as_sql_sort` ```python theme={null} as_sql_sort(self, db:
